name: Tax Evasion Simulator (personion)
description:
What this mess of a game even is:

Tax Evasion Simulator is a fun two player game made to give you the feeling of evading taxes without actually breaking the law, and it's as crazy as the thumbnail might make you think. One player is the annoyed IRS agent, and the other is our tax evading friend. The IRS agent has taken to hurling random objects at the other player in order to make them drop the cash, because apparently nothing else even works anymore.

Controls:
  • IRS Agent
    • Arrow keys to move
    • Left mouse button to hurl a random object towards the mouse
  • Tax Evader
    • WASD to move
    • Arrow points to flag to make it easier to find

DISCLAIMER: This game is not promoting tax evasion in any way. Don't do it. It's not a good idea.

Made for the 2022 Impossible Jam
